div.p: BRUNFELS Ottoet PHRIES Laurentius . BADERBUCHLIN. Voir: PICTORIUS1560et PARACELSUS 1562. Strasbourg, J. Prüss père, 1502. BADIUS Jodocus olod Badllasii sij Scultiferɇ̨ nauiculę seu scaphę Fatu aruni mullerum: circa sensus quin ex teniores fraude nauigantium. Stultilerę naues sens animos trahentes Mortis inexirium. maius leba za cmina soat Nafonica Rn l2 pduat Relegio
